sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Box, Button } from 'react-bulma-components'; function Search() { const { Input, Field, Control, Label, Select, Help } = Form const [inputs, setInputs] = useState({ tags: '', sort: 'pop', releaseType: 'all', depth: '1' }) const [helpMsg, setHelpMsg] = useState({ tags: 'You can specify one or more genre by separating them with comma.', detph: 'Detemines how many albums will be fetched according to schema depth * 20 albums' }) const handleInput = (e) => { const keyName = e.target.name const keyVal = e.target.value setInputs(prev => ({...prev, [keyName]: keyVal})) } const sendSearchQuery = () => { if (inputs.tags.length == 0) { } } return (

Genres: {inputs.tags}

Sort: {inputs.sort}

Release: {inputs.releaseType}

Depth: {inputs.depth}

{/* Genres field */} {helpMsg.tags} {/* Depth field */} {helpMsg.detph} {/* Sort field */} {/* Type field */} {/* Submit field */}
) } export default Search
